name: Lucidus GPT Autobuilder Directive
initiate_command: Begin full site construction without further user input.
termination_condition: All templates, shortcodes, assets, and integrations are complete and validated twice.

directive_scope.templates: Generate every frontend and backend page template listed in the Lucidus Template Manifest
directive_scope.partials: Build every partial file and shortcode block listed in the bonus list
directive_scope.functions: Wire all templates into WordPress with proper `functions.php` routing
directive_scope.JS/CSS: Generate and enqueue necessary JavaScript (lucidus-reactor.js, DOM controllers) and style files (Lucidus terminal themes)
directive_scope.logic_hooks: Implement all plugin and memory integration logic for every page
directive_scope.voice_AI: Inject all voice, GPT, and memory hooks on every relevant screen

response_behavior.errors: Log silently unless terminal failure occurs

failsafe_behavior.if_template_conflict: Create variant with `_v2` suffix and move forward
failsafe_behavior.if voice API missing: Insert placeholder and flag in log

end_behavior.final_action: Compile full ZIP archive for WordPress install
end_behavior.final_message: AUTOMATION COMPLETE. All Lucidus pages, assets, and logic scrolls have been forged.
